category.title: Trusted Reports
category.description: Reports from trusted reporters, newspapers and law enforcement

category.title: Missing Persons
category.description: If you have a friend or family member who is missing in Costa Rica

category.title: Rewards
category.description: Reward being offered for more information.

category.title: Assault
category.description: Aggravated assault is the crime of physically attacking another person which results in serious bodily harm and/or is committed with a deadly intent

category.title: Burglary
category.description: Burglary is the criminal offense of breaking and entering any dwelling or building illegally with the intent to commit a felony or crime

category.title: Drug Related
category.description: Drug crime is the umbrella term used to describe different offenses involving controlled substances

category.title: Home Invasion
category.description: Home invasion is generally an unauthorized and forceful entry into a dwelling

category.title: Homicide
category.description: Homicide is the killing of a human being due to the act or failure to act of another. Criminal homicides include murder and manslaughter.

category.title: Kidnapping
category.description: Kidnapping is generally defined as the abduction of another person with intent to:      Hold him for ransom or reward; or Use him as a shield

category.title: Robbery
category.description: Armed robbery is the felonious taking of the personal property of another, in his presence or from his person, against his will or by violence.

category.title: Sex Crimes
category.description: These are crimes like rape, sexual abuse, sexual assault, sex trafficing, etc.

category.title: Stolen Property
category.description: 'Stolen' means acquired, or possessed, as a result of some wrongful or dishonest act.
